markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Drenching Mist](/Feats.aspx?ID=3379) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 123</row>

**Archetype** [Spell Trickster](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=126)

**Prerequisites**
[Spell Trickster Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3368); ability to cast [_obscuring mist_](/Spells.aspx?ID=210)

</column>

---

When you cast _obscuring mist_, you can modify it to add the following heightened entry to its effects.

 **Heightened (3rd)** Your mist is particularly laden with moisture. Non-magical fires within the area are automatically extinguished. Choose one magical fire or [fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72) spell in the area and attempt to [counteract](/Rules.aspx?ID=371) it.
name: Drenching Mist
prerequisite: Spell Trickster Dedication; ability to cast _obscuring mist_
prerequisite_markdown: [Spell Trickster Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3368); ability to cast [_obscuring mist_](/Spells.aspx?ID=210)

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<additional-info>
<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 123</row>

**Prerequisites**
[Spell Trickster Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3368); ability to cast [_obscuring mist_](/Spells.aspx?ID=210)

</additional-info>

---

<summary>
When you cast _obscuring mist_, you can modify it to extinguish flames.
</summary>
summary: When you cast  obscuring mist , you can modify it to extinguish flames.
summary_markdown: When you cast _obscuring mist_, you can modify it to extinguish flames.

Heightened (3rd) Your mist is particularly laden with moisture. Non-magical fires within the area are automatically extinguished. Choose one magical fire or fire spell in the area and attempt to counteract it.
